rows.label: qst102202_msg0001
rows.name:
You're the ones...
I've heard about you!

rows.label: qst102202_msg0003
rows.name:
Vandham-san took care of me
once when I was little.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0004
rows.name:
I was in Gula before this...
and Invidia before that.
That's when it happened.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0005
rows.name:
When I heard he passed away... I
came back because I wanted to help.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm about to go on my first
mission with this corps.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0007
rows.name:
I was wondering if you would
be willing to help me?

rows.label: qst102202_msg0008
rows.name:
If possible... I'd like to hear
stories about Vandham-san from
you during our downtime.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0010
rows.name:
I'm supposed to meet up with
Squad Chief Corden and the
others in Spirit Crucible Elpys.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0011
rows.name:
I was a little nervous, but if
I can talk about Vandham-san,
I'm looking forward to it.

rows.label: qst102202_msg0012
rows.name:
I'll be waiting at the
rendezvous point.
